a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Social expenditure as share of GDP, France, 1985 to 2015
Public social expenditure covers financial flows controlled by General Government (different levels of government and
social security funds), as social insurance and social assistance payments.
Data source: OECD Stats (2019), The OECD Social Expenditure Database
